tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    soil_moisture DECIMAL,
    temperature DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SoilMoisture (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  moisture_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Temperature (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SensorLocation (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SensorHealth (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  last_update TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  value DECIMAL
)
